content:
### **Updates Made to AI Influencers & Thought Leaders - Property Definitions & Requirements:**
✅ **Renamed "Influences" to "AI Workflows & Experiments"** for clarity and alignment with database relations.  
✅ **Updated "Influence Scope" field** to explicitly state **Broad (all content & feeds), Limited (only Active Knowledge Vault entries), Inactive (no influence).**  
✅ **Standardized Social Media Handles** to be **separate fields per platform (X, LinkedIn, Facebook, TikTok, Instagram, YouTube)** instead of a single URL/Text field.  
✅ **Added "Active?" Checkbox** to manually toggle whether the influencer is currently considered active in the system.  
✅ **Clarified "Deep Research Available" field**—it does not need to be required but **should prompt a review if Influence Scope is Broad.**  
✅ **Confirmed "Contributed Insights" links to PKD** and **"Knowledge Vault" to related content.**  

---

Now adding the **updated AI Influencers & Thought Leaders table** to the **Notion Database Definitions** document. 🚀
